testimonials.text: Riken is an excellent engineer with whom I had the pleasure of working to improve features on our internal Content Management Tool. Riken decided to join our team as a summer intern. His biggest strength I would say is he is open to feedback & implements them asap to help himself grow. He also understands the requirement quickly and unblocks self through the various resources & tools when executing. Riken was able to onboard onto using some of our internal frameworks with ease & shared his learnings later with broader team. He actively participated in team social events & was easy to work with/help based on other team members feedback. I highly recommend Riken if you need to get the job done!

Working with Riken has been an absolute pleasure. He has the strong programming fundamentals required of a software engineer while also having the communication and proactivity of a great team player.While at Meta, we collaborated substantially and I was thoroughly impressed by his ability to jump right into any challenge and independently find the most effective solution to any blocker - be it web development, databases, or cross-functional collaboration. I strongly recommend him and I would unhesitatingly take up the opportunity to work with him again.
